386.text: For the brown sugar buttercream icing, you will need:

399.text: 250 grams of unsalted butter at room temperature,

406.text: Lastly, you will need a little bit of whole milk.

411.text: But it completely depends on how you want your texture of your buttercream.

415.text: The more you add, the more loose it is.

417.text: The less you add, the more thick it is.

419.text: So, it's completely up to you.

421.text: The trick with butter icing, which I say every time is that you have to beat

429.text: And in this case, we have to beat it
